channel.title: Funny Joke :)
channel.description:
Once upon a time, 3 men were exploring when they were trapped by some people The other people forced the explorers to put any of 10 fruits into their ass if they did it, they would be free if they didn't they would die
The first man put apples in his ass. On the 6th one, he started crying. He was killed and went to heaven The second man was smart! He put grapes in his ass. But on the 9th one he started laughing. And got killed.
The two men met in heaven and the first guy asked "why did you laugh" You would of survived!" He answered: "I laughed because the third guy was gonna put pineapples in his ass"

item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

only on these forums can a thread be derailed to the point where the discussion at hand has evolved to discussing the legitimacy of a grape as a fruit, using all sorts of random dictionary citations as substantiations

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Joke :)
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:6, topic:351123”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=447481.msg3285332#msg3285332 date=1280168881]

grapes aren’t necessarily fruits

–noun

  1. the edible, pulpy, smooth-skinned berry or fruit that grows in clusters on vines of the genus Vitis, and from which wine is made.
  2. any vine bearing this fruit

Dictionary results

[/quote]1. the edible, pulpy, smooth-skinned berry or fruit that grows in clusters on vines of the genus Vitis, and from which wine is made][/quote]

berry
1.
any small, usually stoneless, juicy fruit, irrespective of botanical structure, as the huckleberry, strawberry, or hackberry.

?

Read full topic

item.title: Funny Joke :)
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Once upon a time, 3 men were exploring when they were trapped by some people
The other people forced the explorers to put any of 10 fruits into their ass
if they did it, they would be free
if they didn’t they would die

The first man put apples in his ass. On the 6th one, he started crying. He was killed and went to heaven
The second man was smart! He put grapes in his ass. But on the 9th one he started laughing. And got killed.

The two men met in heaven and the first guy asked “why did you laugh” You would of survived!"
He answered: “I laughed because the third guy was gonna put pineapples in his ass”

Read full topic
